Perceptor:

"Well, Kitkat"replied Perceptor "Soon you will be resting in a CR... 
after that, you will meet Hydras"

Perceptor arrived to Predacon's base and he moved towards Cr. 

"You can relax now"said cooly th male

He left the femme inside one and closed the door.. And he starting 
to the process of CR... with a reprograming sesion to convert the 
bot in a loyal Predacon for Hydras.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@y...>" 
<raccoon7679@y...> wrote:
> KitKat::
> 
> KitKat was unaware of the bot's approach untill it was right next 
to 
> her.  She couldn't quite get her optics to focus properly.  She 
> checked her energy levels. In a few hours, her energy cells would 
be 
> empty. She decided to not fight and spend the energy unless 
> nessassary.  She whispered, "Kit....KitKat." She was about to ask 
> the bot a question when the exposed wires in her shoulder  sparked 
> and she cried out in pain.
>
